name: Flowkit
description:
NOTE: Flowkit is a premium plugin and requires a license to activate. To obtain a license, please visit useflowkit.com

✔ Quick and easy flow creation right inside your favorite design tool.
✔ Intelligently-named components and file structure.
✔ Smart resizing rules baked into each component.
✔ Components place in the center of the canvas view OR to the right 
    of a selected object.
✔ Flowkit stays visible by default, but you can make it hide 
    automatically after placement via settings.
✔ Flows, Taps, Swipes, Long presses, Blocks, and Annotations can 
    all be placed with a click.
✔ Works in conjuction with the Flowkit component library so it's 
    easy to swap nested components or choose alternate styles.
